hc_add_series.density hc_add_series for density objects

#### Description 

hc_add_series for density objects

#### Usage 
<pre><code>
## S3 method for class 'density'
hc_add_series(hc, data, ...)
</code></pre> 
#### Arguments 
 

* ``hc ``: A highchart htmlwidget object.
data A density object.
* ``...``: Arguments defined in http://api.highcharts.com/highcharts#chart.
